nodes.excerpt: Expand your skills as an artist with daily art challenges. Categories include drawing, photography, painting, and typography. The best way to improve is daily practice. Challenge yourself and your friends to create something new every day with Creact!
nodes.title: Creact - Daily art & drawing challenges to improve your art skills
nodes.author: Brian Hulme

localize.description: 通过每天的艺术挑战来扩展你作为一个艺术家的技能。类别包括绘画、摄影、绘画和排版。提高技能的最好方法就是每天练习。通过Creact！挑战你和你的朋友，每天创造新的东西。
localize.tagline: 每天的艺术和绘画挑战，提高你的艺术技能。

localize.description: 通過每天的藝術挑戰來擴展你作爲一個藝術家的技能。類別包括繪畫、攝影、繪畫和排版。提高技能的最好方法就是每天練習。通過Creact！挑戰你和你的朋友，每天創造新的東西。
localize.tagline: 每天的藝術和繪畫挑戰，提高你的藝術技能。

nodes.excerpt: Agree is a shared voting app to help you come to a joint decision with friends and colleagues. Create and share polls, and simply swipe right to vote yes and left for no. Winning options pop up as a notification once everyone has voted.
nodes.title: Agree - Polls with friends
nodes.author: JPEGuin

localize.description: Agree是一款共享投票应用，帮助你与朋友和同事达成共同的决定。创建和分享投票，只需向右滑动投赞成票，向左滑动投反对票。一旦大家都投了票，获胜的选项就会以通知的形式弹出。
localize.tagline: 与朋友一起投票

localize.description: Agree是一款共享投票應用，幫助你與朋友和同事達成共同的決定。創建和分享投票，只需向右滑動投贊成票，向左滑動投反對票。一旦大家都投了票，獲勝的選項就會以通知的形式彈出。
localize.tagline: 與朋友一起投票

nodes.excerpt: Create compelling video ads and marketing videos in the palm of your hand. Produce top-quality content designed specifically for business within minutes, even if you’ve never made a video before.

localize.description: 在您的手掌中创建引人注目的视频广告和营销视频。即使您从未制作过视频，也能在几分钟内制作出专门为企业设计的高质量内容。
localize.tagline: 在手机上几分钟内制作营销视频

nodes.excerpt: Trainn helps SaaS companies accelerate product adoption with product walkthrough videos and training academies for users. With better product education leads to better onboarding and decreases time to value of your product leading to higher retention.
nodes.title: Trainn - A new way to create professional product walkthrough videos.

localize.description: Trainn帮助SaaS公司通过产品演练视频和用户培训学院来加速产品的应用。通过更好的产品教育，使用户更好地入职，减少产品价值的时间，从而提高用户的留存率。
localize.tagline: 一种全新的方式来制作专业的产品演练视频。

localize.tagline: 一種全新的方式來製作專業的產品演練視頻。

nodes.excerpt: Earn more revenue from your app or site without showing ads (OR) placing more ads AudiencePlay converts every user footprint into audiences and shares it with brands to unlock an alternative revenue stream Secure + ISO27001 Certified + Privacy Complaint
nodes.title: AudiencePlay - Free monetization platform for websites and apps

nodes.excerpt: An estimate 60% of small businesses closed down due to covid. Now more than ever they need your help. I created some tools and training to teach you how to build a local lead generation business to help out these businesses.

nodes.excerpt: 🏴 Flagpack is an open source project of 260+ stunning flag icons for your digital product. Easily implementable in your design or code project. Download for Figma, Sketch and Adobe XD (coming soon) or install for React, Vue or Angular (coming soon).

nodes.excerpt: Already trusted by companies like Cartier, Square, Conde Nast, and Signal Messaging, Mixer is a professional network empowering creatives to make the right connections, find jobs, and recruit top talent.
nodes.title: Mixer - The Creative Network - Make connections, find jobs, and recruit top creative talent

localize.description: Mixer已经受到卡地亚、Square、Conde Nast和Signal Messaging等公司的信任，它是一个专业的网络，帮助创意人建立正确的联系，找到工作，并招募顶尖人才。

localize.tagline: 建立聯繫，尋找工作，招聘頂級創意人才。

localize.description: 将Willo异步视频面试与您的工作流程整合，释放生产力的超能力。在 Zapier 的帮助下，连接超过 2,000 个应用程序，并在没有麻烦的情况下对人们进行采访。
localize.tagline: 使用Zapier自动化您的招聘流程。

nodes.excerpt: A crazy online island to get lost in, solve puzzles together and stop a rogue A.I. from uploading his malicious code onto the web. Created by Amsterdam based escape room designers Sherlocked and the team behind the new spacial video chat platform Mibo.
nodes.title: Escape from Mibo Island - An amazing 3D spacial video escape room game
nodes.author: Bram Kanstein (@bramk)

localize.description: 一个疯狂的在线岛屿，让你迷失在其中，一起解开谜题，阻止一个无赖的人工智能将他的恶意代码上传到网上。由阿姆斯特丹的逃生室设计师Sherlocked和新的空间视频聊天平台Mibo背后的团队创建。
localize.tagline: 一个惊人的3D空间视频逃生室游戏。

localize.description: 一個瘋狂的在線島嶼，讓你迷失在其中，一起解開謎題，阻止一個無賴的人工智能將他的惡意代碼上傳到網上。由阿姆斯特丹的逃生室設計師Sherlocked和新的空間視頻聊天平臺Mibo背後的團隊創建。
localize.tagline: 一個驚人的3D空間視頻逃生室遊戲。

nodes.excerpt: GetMyInvoices is the central invoice management software for your company. The solution automatically retrieves invoices & other documents from thousands of sources – from portals over email postboxes and cloud storages to scanned documents. 14 Days FREE Trial
nodes.title: GetMyInvoices.com - Automatically retrieve invoices & docs from thousand sources
nodes.author: GetMyInvoices

localize.description: GetMyInvoices是贵公司的中央发票管理软件。该解决方案自动检索发票和其他文件从成千上万的来源 - 从门户网站的电子邮件邮箱和云存储到扫描文件。14天免费试用
localize.tagline: 从上千个来源自动检索发票和文件。

localize.tagline: 從上千個來源自動檢索發票和文件。

nodes.excerpt: Open Design is the first developer toolkit to read, change, and display data from design files 📤 Process any Figma, Sketch, PSD, AI, or XD file via API 📥 Get design data in a unified JSON format 🛠 Build automations and tools to improve design workflows
nodes.title: Open Design - Dev toolkit to read, change & display data from design files
nodes.author: Tristan Pollock

localize.description: Open Design是第一个从设计文件中读取、更改和显示数据的开发者工具包 📤 通过API处理任何Figma、Sketch、PSD、AI或XD文件 📥 以统一的JSON格式获取设计数据 🛠 构建自动化和工具以改善设计工作流程。
localize.tagline: 从设计文件中读取、更改和显示数据的开发工具包。

localize.description: Open Design是第一個從設計文件中讀取、更改和顯示數據的開發者工具包 📤 通過API處理任何Figma、Sketch、PSD、AI或XD文件 📥 以統一的JSON格式獲取設計數據 🛠 構建自動化和工具以改善設計工作流程。
localize.tagline: 從設計文件中讀取、更改和顯示數據的開發工具包。

nodes.excerpt: Talium is a doc editor meets web builder. Ship beautiful pages in the time it takes to send an email.    Create quick event pages, job posts, or a page about yourself. Choose from beautiful themes—even video backgrounds!
nodes.title: Talium - Publish beautiful webpages in under 3 minutes
nodes.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: Talium是一个文档编辑器与网页构建器的结合。在发送电子邮件所需的时间内发送漂亮的页面。    创建快速的活动页面，工作帖子，或关于你自己的页面。从美丽的主题中选择，甚至是视频背景。
localize.tagline: 在3分钟内发布漂亮的网页

localize.description: Talium是一個文檔編輯器與網頁構建器的結合。在發送電子郵件所需的時間內發送漂亮的頁面。    創建快速的活動頁面，工作帖子，或關於你自己的頁面。從美麗的主題中選擇，甚至是視頻背景。
localize.tagline: 在3分鐘內發佈漂亮的網頁

nodes.excerpt: Brainiac is a database of 150 cognitive biases, principles & models that influence customer's decision, let you create better products and help you increase your sales. Every single bias includes a sketch, description, possible applications and more
nodes.title: Brainiac - Database of 150 cognitive biases that control our decisions
nodes.author: Mike

localize.description: Brainiac是一个包含150个影响客户决策的认知偏差、原理和模型的数据库，让你创造更好的产品，帮助你提高销售额。每一个偏向都包括一个草图、描述、可能的应用等。
localize.tagline: 控制我们决策的150种认知偏差的数据库。

localize.description: Brainiac是一個包含150個影響客戶決策的認知偏差、原理和模型的數據庫，讓你創造更好的產品，幫助你提高銷售額。每一個偏向都包括一個草圖、描述、可能的應用等。
localize.tagline: 控制我們決策的150種認知偏差的數據庫。

nodes.excerpt: http://blocks.wickedtemplates.com/ are an open source collection of layout blocks and components built with Tailwind CSS V2 ready to copy-paste on your Tailwind project.
nodes.title: WickedBlocks - Tailwind V2 blocks ready to copy paste
nodes.author: ᴍɪᴄʜᴀᴇʟ ᴀɴᴅʀᴇᴜᴢᴢᴀ

localize.description: http://blocks.wickedtemplates.com/ 是一个开放源码的布局块和组件集合，用Tailwind CSS V2构建，准备复制粘贴到您的Tailwind项目上。
localize.tagline: 尾风V2块准备复制粘贴

localize.description: http://blocks.wickedtemplates.com/ 是一個開放源碼的佈局塊和組件集合，用Tailwind CSS V2構建，準備複製粘貼到您的Tailwind項目上。
localize.tagline: 尾風V2塊準備複製粘貼
